title: Black Holes Wormholes and Time Machines eBook
description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Do you know:

		*What might happen if you fall into a black hole?

		*That the Universe does not have an edge?

		*That the reason it gets dark at night is proof of 
		the Big Bang?

		*That cosmic particles time-travel through the 
		atmosphere defying death?

		*That our past, present and future might all 
		coexist "out there"?

	
		Theoretical physicist Jim Al-Khalili finally lays 
		science fiction to rest as he opens up Einstein's 
		Universe. Leading us gently and light-heartedly 
		through the dizzying world of our space and time, he 
		ultimately gives us the recipe for a possible time 
		machine, capable of taking us Back to the Future, to 
		Alice's Wonderland or on a trip with the Terminator.


---------------------------------------------------------------------

I've found this great book last year on piratebay. 
Old torrent seems dead now, so time to reupload =) 
Hope you'll like it as much as I did. 

Cheers mates!
